   20: 
   21: -module(ssl_payload_SUITE).
   22: 
   23: -behaviour(ct_suite).
   24: 
   25: -include("ssl_test_lib.hrl").
   26: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   27: %% Common test
   28: -export([all/0,
   29:          groups/0,
   30:          init_per_suite/1,
   31:          init_per_group/2,
   32:          init_per_testcase/2,
   33:          end_per_suite/1,
   34:          end_per_group/2,
   35:          end_per_testcase/2
   36:         ]).
   37: 
   38: %% Test cases
   39: -export([server_echos_passive_small/0,
   40:          server_echos_passive_small/1,
   41:          server_echos_passive_chunk_small/0,
   42:          server_echos_passive_chunk_small/1,
   43:          server_echos_active_once_small/0,
   44:          server_echos_active_once_small/1,
   45:          server_echos_active_small/0,
   46:          server_echos_active_small/1,
   47:          client_echos_passive_small/0,
   48:          client_echos_passive_small/1,
   49:          client_echos_passive_chunk_small/0,
   50:          client_echos_passive_chunk_small/1,
   51:          client_echos_active_once_small/0,
   52:          client_echos_active_once_small/1,
   53:          client_echos_active_small/0,
   54:          client_echos_active_small/1,
   55:          server_echos_passive_big/0,
   56:          server_echos_passive_big/1,
   57:          server_echos_passive_chunk_big/0,
   58:          server_echos_passive_chunk_big/1,
   59:          server_echos_active_once_big/0,
   60:          server_echos_active_once_big/1,
   61:          server_echos_active_big/0,
   62:          server_echos_active_big/1,
   63:          client_echos_passive_big/0,
   64:          client_echos_passive_big/1,
   65:          client_echos_passive_chunk_big/0,
   66:          client_echos_passive_chunk_big/1,
   67:          client_echos_active_once_big/0,
   68:          client_echos_active_once_big/1,
   69:          client_echos_active_big/0,
   70:          client_echos_active_big/1,
   71:          server_echos_passive_huge/0,
   72:          server_echos_passive_huge/1,
   73:          server_echos_passive_chunk_huge/0,
   74:          server_echos_passive_chunk_huge/1,
   75:          server_echos_active_once_huge/0,
   76:          server_echos_active_once_huge/1,
   77:          server_echos_active_huge/0,
   78:          server_echos_active_huge/1,
   79:          client_echos_passive_huge/0,
   80:          client_echos_passive_huge/1,
   81:          client_echos_passive_chunk_huge/0,
   82:          client_echos_passive_chunk_huge/1,
   83:          client_echos_active_once_huge/0,
   84:          client_echos_active_once_huge/1,
   85:          client_echos_active_huge/0,
   86:          client_echos_active_huge/1,
   87:          client_active_once_server_close/0,
   88:          client_active_once_server_close/1]).
   89: 
   90: %% Apply export
   91: -export([send/4,
   92:          send_close/2,
   93:          sender/2,
   94:          sender_active_once/2,
   95:          sender_active/2,
   96:          echoer/2,
   97:          echoer_chunk/2,
   98:          echoer_active_once/2,
   99:          echoer_active/2,
  100:          echo_recv/2,
  101:          echo_recv_chunk/3,
  102:          echo_active_once/2,
  103:          echo_active/2]).
  104: 
  105: -define(TIMEOUT, {seconds, 20}).
  106: -define(TIMEOUT_LONG, {seconds, 80}).
  107: 
  108: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  109: %% Common Test interface functions -----------------------------------
  110: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  111: all() -> 
  112:     [
  113:      {group, 'tlsv1.3'},
  114:      {group, 'tlsv1.2'},
  115:      {group, 'tlsv1.1'},
  116:      {group, 'tlsv1'},
  117:      {group, transport_socket}
  118:     ].
  119: 
  120: groups() ->
  121:     [
  122:      {'tlsv1.3', [parallel], payload_tests()},
  123:      {'tlsv1.2', [parallel], payload_tests()},
  124:      {'tlsv1.1', [parallel], payload_tests()},
  125:      {'tlsv1', [parallel], payload_tests()},
  126:      {transport_socket, [parallel], payload_tests()}
  127:     ].
  128: 
  129: payload_tests() ->
  130:     [server_echos_passive_small,
  131:      server_echos_passive_chunk_small,
  132:      server_echos_active_once_small,
  133:      server_echos_active_small,
  134:      client_echos_passive_small,
  135:      client_echos_passive_chunk_small,
  136:      client_echos_active_once_small,
  137:      client_echos_active_small,
  138:      server_echos_passive_big,
  139:      server_echos_passive_chunk_big,
  140:      server_echos_active_once_big,
  141:      server_echos_active_big,
  142:      client_echos_passive_big,
  143:      client_echos_passive_chunk_big,
  144:      client_echos_active_once_big,
  145:      client_echos_active_big,
  146:      server_echos_passive_huge,
  147:      server_echos_passive_chunk_huge,
  148:      server_echos_active_once_huge,
  149:      server_echos_active_huge,
  150:      client_echos_passive_huge,
  151:      client_echos_passive_chunk_huge,
  152:      client_echos_active_once_huge,
  153:      client_echos_active_huge,
  154:      client_active_once_server_close].
  155: 
  156: init_per_suite(Config) ->
  157:     catch application:stop(crypto),
  158:     try application:start(crypto) of
  159: 	ok ->
  160: 	    ssl_test_lib:clean_start(),
  161:             ssl_test_lib:make_rsa_cert(Config)
  162:     catch _:_  ->
  163: 	    {skip, "Crypto did not start"}
  164:     end.
  165: 
  166: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
  167:     ssl:stop(),
  168:     application:stop(crypto).
  169: 
  170: init_per_group(GroupName, Config) ->
  171:     ssl_test_lib:init_per_group(GroupName, Config). 
  172: 
  173: end_per_group(GroupName, Config) ->
  174:     ssl_test_lib:end_per_group(GroupName, Config).
  175: 
  176: 
  177: init_per_testcase(TestCase, Config)
  178:   when TestCase == server_echos_passive_huge;
  179:        TestCase == server_echos_passive_chunk_huge;
  180:        TestCase == server_echos_active_once_huge;
  181:        TestCase == server_echos_active_huge;
  182:        TestCase == client_echos_passive_huge;
  183:        TestCase == client_echos_passive_chunk_huge;
  184:        TestCase == client_echos_active_once_huge;
  185:        TestCase == client_echos_active_huge ->
  186:     case erlang:system_info(system_architecture) of
  187: 	"sparc-sun-solaris2.10" ->
  188: 	    {skip,"Will take to long time on an old Sparc"};
  189: 	_ ->
  190: 	    ct:timetrap(?TIMEOUT_LONG),
  191: 	    Config
  192:     end;
  193: 
  194: init_per_testcase(TestCase, Config)
  195:   when TestCase == server_echos_passive_big;
  196:        TestCase == server_echos_passive_chunk_big;
  197:        TestCase == server_echos_active_once_big;
  198:        TestCase == server_echos_active_big;
  199:        TestCase == client_echos_passive_big;
  200:        TestCase == client_echos_passive_chunk_big;
  201:        TestCase == client_echos_active_once_big;
  202:        TestCase == client_echos_active_big ->
  203:     ct:timetrap(?TIMEOUT_LONG),
  204:     Config;
  205: 
  206: init_per_testcase(_TestCase, Config) ->
  207:     ct:timetrap(?TIMEOUT),
  208:     Config.
  209: 
  210: end_per_testcase(_TestCase, Config) ->
  211:     Config.
  212: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  213: %% Test Cases --------------------------------------------------------
  214: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  215: 
  216: server_echos_passive_small() ->
  217:     [{doc, "Client sends 1000 bytes in passive mode to server, that receives them, "
  218:      "sends them back, and closes."}].
  219: 
  220: server_echos_passive_small(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
  221:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  222:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  223:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  224:     %%
  225:     Data = binary:copy(<<"1234567890">>, 100),
  226:     server_echos_passive(
  227:       Data, ClientOpts, ServerOpts, ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname).
  228: 
  229: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  230: 
  231: server_echos_passive_chunk_small() ->
  232:     [{doc, "Client sends 1000 bytes in passive mode to server, that receives them in chunks, "
  233:      "sends them back, and closes."}].
  234: 
  235: server_echos_passive_chunk_small(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
  236:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  237:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  238:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  239:     %%
  240:     Data = binary:copy(<<"1234567890">>, 100),
  241:     server_echos_passive_chunk(
  242:       Data, ClientOpts, ServerOpts, ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname).
  243: 
  244: 
  245: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  246: 
  247: server_echos_active_once_small() ->
  248:     [{doc, "Client sends 1000 bytes in active once mode to server, that receives "
  249:      " them, sends them back, and closes."}].
  250: 
  251: server_echos_active_once_small(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
  252:         ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  253:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  254:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  255:     %%
  256:     Data = binary:copy(<<"1234567890">>, 100),
  257:     server_echos_active_once(
  258:       Data, ClientOpts, ServerOpts, ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname).
  259: 
  260: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  261: 
  262: server_echos_active_small() ->
  263:     [{doc, "Client sends 1000 bytes in active mode to server, that receives them, "
  264:      "sends them back, and closes."}].
  265: 
  266: server_echos_active_small(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
  267:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  268:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  269:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  270:     %%
  271:     Data = binary:copy(<<"1234567890">>, 100),
  272:     server_echos_active(
  273:       Data, ClientOpts, ServerOpts, ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname).
  274: 
  275: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  276: client_echos_passive_small() ->
  277:     [{doc, "Server sends 1000 bytes in passive mode to client, that receives them, "
  278:       "sends them back, and closes."}].
  279: 
  280: client_echos_passive_small(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
  281:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),

  287:       Data, ClientOpts, ServerOpts, ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname).
  288: 
  289: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  290: client_echos_passive_chunk_small() ->
  291:     [{doc, "Server sends 1000 bytes in passive mode to client, that receives them in chunks, "
  292:       "sends them back, and closes."}].
  293: 
  294: client_echos_passive_chunk_small(Config) when is_list(Config) ->

  302: 
  303: 
  304: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  305: client_echos_active_once_small() ->
  306:     ["Server sends 1000 bytes in active once mode to client, that receives "

  308:

  476: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  477: server_echos_active_once_huge() ->

  479:       "them, sends them back, and closes."}].

  481: server_echos_active_once_huge(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
  482:         ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),

  484:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  485:     %%
  486:     Data = binary:copy(<<"1234567890">>, 50000),
  487:     server_echos_active_once(
  488:       Data, ClientOpts, ServerOpts, ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname).
  489: 
  490: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  491: server_echos_active_huge() ->
  492:     [{doc, "Client sends 500000 bytes to server in active mode, that receives them, "
  493:      "sends them back, and closes."}].
  494: 
  495: server_echos_active_huge(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
  496:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  497:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  498:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  499:     %%
  500:     Data = binary:copy(<<"1234567890">>, 50000),
  501:     server_echos_active(
  502:       Data, ClientOpts, ServerOpts, ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname).
  503: 
  504: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  505: client_echos_passive_huge() ->
  506:     [{doc, "Server sends 500000 bytes to client in passive mode, that receives "
  507:      "them, sends them back, and closes."}].
  508: 
  509: client_echos_passive_huge(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
  510:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  511:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  512:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  513:     %%
  514:     Data = binary:copy(<<"1234567890">>, 50000),
  515:     client_echos_passive(
  516:       Data, ClientOpts, ServerOpts, ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname).
  517: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  518: client_echos_passive_chunk_huge() ->
  519:     [{doc, "Server sends 500000 bytes to client in passive mode, that receives "
  520:      "them, sends them back, and closes."}].
  521: 
  522: client_echos_passive_chunk_huge(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
  523:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  524:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  525:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  526:     %%
  527:     Data = binary:copy(<<"1234567890">>, 50000),
  528:     client_echos_passive_chunk(
  529:       Data, ClientOpts, ServerOpts, ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname).
  530: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  531: client_echos_active_once_huge() ->
  532:     [{doc, "Server sends 500000 bytes to client in active once mode, that receives "
  533:       "them, sends them back, and closes."}].
  534: 
  535: client_echos_active_once_huge(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
  536:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  537:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  538:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  539:     %%
  540:     Data = binary:copy(<<"1234567890">>, 50000),
  541:     client_echos_active_once(
  542:       Data, ClientOpts, ServerOpts, ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname).
  543:    
  544: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  545: client_echos_active_huge() ->
  546:     [{doc, "Server sends 500000 bytes to client in active mode, that receives them, "
  547:      "sends them back, and closes."}].
  548: 
  549: client_echos_active_huge(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
  550:      ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  551:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  552:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  553:     %%
  554:     Data = binary:copy(<<"1234567890">>, 50000),
  555:     client_echos_active(
  556:       Data, ClientOpts, ServerOpts, ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname).
  557:  
  558: 
  559: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  560: client_active_once_server_close() ->
  561:     [{doc, "Server sends 500000 bytes and immediately after closes the connection"
  562:      "Make sure client receives all data if possible"}].
  563: 
  564: client_active_once_server_close(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
  565:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  566:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  567:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  568:     %%
  569:     Data = binary:copy(<<"1234567890">>, 50000),
  570:     client_active_once_server_close(
  571:       Data, ClientOpts, ServerOpts, ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname).
  572:  
  573: 
  574: 
  575: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  576: %% Internal functions ------------------------------------------------
  577: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  578: 
  579: server_echos_passive(
  580:   Data, ClientOpts, ServerOpts, ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname) ->
  581:     Length = byte_size(Data),
  582:     Server =
  583:         ssl_test_lib:start_server(
  584:           [{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  585:            {from, self()},
  586:            {mfa, {?MODULE, echoer, [Length]}},
  587:            {options, [{active, false}, {mode, binary} | ServerOpts] ++ ssl_test_lib:bigger_buffers()}]),
  588:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  589:     Client =
  590:         ssl_test_lib:start_client(
  591:           [{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
  592:            {host, Hostname},
  593:            {from, self()},
  594:            {mfa, {?MODULE, sender, [Data]}},
  595:            {options, [{active, false}, {mode, binary} | ClientOpts] ++ ssl_test_lib:bigger_buffers() }]),
  596:     %%
  597:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok, Client, ok),
  598:     %%
  599:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
  600:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client).
  601: 
  602: server_echos_passive_chunk(
  603:   Data, ClientOpts, ServerOpts, ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname) ->
  604:     Length = byte_size(Data),
  605:     Server =
  606:         ssl_test_lib:start_server(
  607:           [{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  608:            {from, self()},
  609:            {mfa, {?MODULE, echoer_chunk, [Length]}},
  610:            {options, [{active, false}, {mode, binary} | ServerOpts]}]),
  611:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  612:     Client =
  613:         ssl_test_lib:start_client(
  614:           [{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
  615:            {host, Hostname},
  616:            {from, self()},
  617:            {mfa, {?MODULE, sender, [Data]}},
  618:            {options, [{active, false}, {mode, binary} | ClientOpts]}]),
  619:     %%
  620:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok, Client, ok),
  621:     %%
  622:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
  623:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client).
  624: 
  625: server_echos_active_once(
  626:   Data, ClientOpts, ServerOpts, ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname) ->
  627:     Length = byte_size(Data),
  628:     Server =
  629:         ssl_test_lib:start_server(
  630:           [{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  631:            {from, self()},
  632:            {mfa, {?MODULE, echoer_active_once, [Length]}},
  633:            {options, [{active, once}, {mode, binary} | ServerOpts] ++ ssl_test_lib:bigger_buffers()}]),
  634:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  635:     Client =
  636:         ssl_test_lib:start_client(
  637:           [{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
  638:            {host, Hostname},
  639:            {from, self()},
  640:            {mfa, {?MODULE, sender_active_once, [Data]}},
  641:            {options, [{active, once}, {mode, binary} | ClientOpts] ++ ssl_test_lib:bigger_buffers() }]),
  642:     %%
  643:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok, Client, ok),
  644:     %%
  645:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
  646:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client).
  647: 
  648: 
  649: server_echos_active(
  650:   Data, ClientOpts, ServerOpts, ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname) ->
  651:     Length = byte_size(Data),
  652:     Server =
  653:         ssl_test_lib:start_server(
  654:           [{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  655:            {from, self()},
  656:            {mfa, {?MODULE, echoer_active, [Length]}},
  657:            {options, [{active, true}, {mode, binary} | ServerOpts] ++ ssl_test_lib:bigger_buffers()}]),
  658:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  659:     Client =
  660:         ssl_test_lib:start_client(
  661:           [{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
  662:            {host, Hostname},
  663:            {from, self()},
  664:            {mfa, {?MODULE, sender_active, [Data]}},
  665:            {options, [{active, true}, {mode, binary} | ClientOpts] ++ ssl_test_lib:bigger_buffers()}]),
  666:     %%
  667:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok, Client, ok),
  668:     %%
  669:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
  670:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client).
  671: 
  672: client_echos_passive(
  673:   Data, ClientOpts, ServerOpts, ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname) ->
  674:     Length = byte_size(Data),
  675:     Server =
  676:         ssl_test_lib:start_server(
  677:           [{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  678:            {from, self()},
  679:            {mfa, {?MODULE, sender, [Data]}},
  680:            {options, [{active, false}, {mode, binary} | ServerOpts] ++ ssl_test_lib:bigger_buffers()}]),
  681:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  682:     Client =
  683:         ssl_test_lib:start_client(
  684:           [{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
  685:            {host, Hostname},
  686:            {from, self()},
  687:            {mfa, {?MODULE, echoer, [Length]}},
  688:            {options, [{active, false}, {mode, binary} | ClientOpts] ++ ssl_test_lib:bigger_buffers()}]),
  689:     %%
  690:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok, Client, ok),
  691:     %%
  692:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
  693:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client).
  694: 
  695: 
  696: client_echos_passive_chunk(
  697:   Data, ClientOpts, ServerOpts, ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname) ->
  698:     Length = byte_size(Data),
  699:     Server =
  700:         ssl_test_lib:start_server(
  701:           [{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  702:            {from, self()},
  703:            {mfa, {?MODULE, sender, [Data]}},
  704:            {options, [{active, false}, {mode, binary} | ServerOpts] ++ ssl_test_lib:bigger_buffers()}]),
  705:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  706:     Client =
  707:         ssl_test_lib:start_client(
  708:           [{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
  709:            {host, Hostname},
  710:            {from, self()},
  711:            {mfa, {?MODULE, echoer_chunk, [Length]}},
  712:            {options, [{active, false}, {mode, binary} | ClientOpts] ++ ssl_test_lib:bigger_buffers()}]),
  713:     %%
  714:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok, Client, ok),
  715:     %%
  716:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
  717:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client).
  718: 
  719: 
  720: client_echos_active_once(
  721:   Data, ClientOpts, ServerOpts, ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname) ->
  722:     Length = byte_size(Data),
  723:     Server =
  724:         ssl_test_lib:start_server(
  725:           [{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  726:            {from, self()},
  727:            {mfa, {?MODULE, sender_active_once, [Data]}},
  728:            {options, [{active, once}, {mode, binary} | ServerOpts] ++ ssl_test_lib:bigger_buffers()}]),
  729:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  730:     Client =
  731:         ssl_test_lib:start_client(
  732:           [{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
  733:            {host, Hostname},
  734:            {from, self()},
  735:            {mfa, {?MODULE, echoer_active_once, [Length]}},
  736:            {options,[{active, once}, {mode, binary} | ClientOpts] ++ ssl_test_lib:bigger_buffers()}]),
  737:     %%
  738:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok, Client, ok),
  739:     %%
  740:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
  741:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client).
  742: 
  743: client_echos_active(
  744:   Data, ClientOpts, ServerOpts, ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname) ->
  745:     Length = byte_size(Data),
  746:     Server =
  747:         ssl_test_lib:start_server(
  748:           [{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  749:            {from, self()},
  750:            {mfa, {?MODULE, sender_active, [Data]}},
  751:            {options, [{active, true}, {mode, binary} | ServerOpts] ++ ssl_test_lib:bigger_buffers()}]),
  752:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  753:     Client =
  754:         ssl_test_lib:start_client(
  755:           [{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
  756:            {host, Hostname},
  757:            {from, self()},
  758:            {mfa, {?MODULE, echoer_active, [Length]}},
  759:            {options, [{active, true}, {mode, binary} | ClientOpts] ++ ssl_test_lib:bigger_buffers()}]),
  760:     %
  761:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok, Client, ok),
  762:     %%
  763:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
  764:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client).
  765: 
  766: client_active_once_server_close(
  767:   Data, ClientOpts, ServerOpts, ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname) ->
  768:     Length = byte_size(Data),
  769:     Server =
  770:         ssl_test_lib:start_server(
  771:           [{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  772:            {from, self()},
  773:            {mfa, {?MODULE, send_close, [Data]}},
  774:            {options, [{active, once}, {mode, binary} | ServerOpts]}]),
  775:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  776:     Client =
  777:         ssl_test_lib:start_client(
  778:           [{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
  779:            {host, Hostname},
  780:            {from, self()},
  781:            {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, active_once_recv, [Length]}},
  782:            {options,[{active, once}, {mode, binary} | ClientOpts]}]),
  783:     %%
  784:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok, Client, ok).
  785: 
  786: send(_Socket, _Data, 0, _) ->
  787:     ok;
  788: send(Socket, Data, Count, RecvEcho) ->
  789:     spawn(fun() -> ssl:send(Socket, Data) end),
  790:     RecvEcho(),
  791:     send(Socket, Data, Count - 1, RecvEcho).
  792: 
  793: send_close(Socket, Data) ->
  794:     ok = ssl:send(Socket, Data),
  795:     ssl:close(Socket).
  796: 
  797: sender(Socket, Data) ->
  798:     ?CT_LOG("Sender recv: ~p~n", [ssl:getopts(Socket, [active])]),
  799:     send(Socket, Data, 100,
  800:               fun() -> 
  801:                       ssl_test_lib:recv_disregard(Socket, byte_size(Data)) 
  802:               end).
  803: 
  804: sender_active_once(Socket, Data) ->
  805:     ?CT_LOG("Sender active once: ~p~n", [ssl:getopts(Socket, [active])]),
  806:     send(Socket, Data, 100,
  807:          fun() -> 
  808:                  ssl_test_lib:active_once_disregard(Socket, byte_size(Data)) 
  809:          end).
  810: 
  811: sender_active(Socket, Data) ->
  812:     ?CT_LOG("Sender active: ~p~n", [ssl:getopts(Socket, [active])]),
  813:     send(Socket, Data, 100,
  814:          fun() -> 
  815:                  ssl_test_lib:active_disregard(Socket, byte_size(Data)) 
  816:          end).
  817: 
  818: echoer(Socket, Size) ->
  819:     ?CT_LOG("Echoer recv: ~p~n", [ssl:getopts(Socket, [active])]),
  820:     echo_recv(Socket, Size * 100).
  821: 
  822: echoer_chunk(Socket, Size) ->
  823:     ?CT_LOG("Echoer recv: ~p~n", [ssl:getopts(Socket, [active])]),
  824:     echo_recv_chunk(Socket, Size, Size * 100).
  825: 
  826: echoer_active_once(Socket, Size) ->
  827:     ?CT_LOG("Echoer active once: ~p~n", [ssl:getopts(Socket, [active])]),
  828:     echo_active_once(Socket, Size * 100).
  829: 
  830: echoer_active(Socket, Size) ->
  831:     ?CT_LOG("Echoer active: ~p~n", [ssl:getopts(Socket, [active])]),
  832:     echo_active(Socket, Size * 100).
  833: 
  834: 
  835: %% Receive Size bytes
  836: echo_recv(_Socket, 0) ->
  837:     ok;
  838: echo_recv(Socket, Size) ->
  839:     {ok, Data} = ssl:recv(Socket, 0),
  840:     spawn(fun() -> ssl:send(Socket, Data) end),
  841:     echo_recv(Socket, Size - byte_size(Data)).
  842: 
  843: 
  844: %% Receive Size bytes
  845: echo_recv_chunk(_Socket, _, 0) ->
  846:     ok;
  847: echo_recv_chunk(Socket, ChunkSize, Size) ->
  848:     {ok, Data} = ssl:recv(Socket, ChunkSize),
  849:     spawn(fun() -> ssl:send(Socket, Data) end),
  850:     echo_recv_chunk(Socket, ChunkSize, Size - ChunkSize).
  851: 
  852: 
  853: %% Receive Size bytes
  854: echo_active_once(_Socket, 0) ->
  855:     ok;
  856: echo_active_once(Socket, Size) ->
  857:     receive
  858:         {ssl, Socket, Data} ->
  859:             spawn(fun() -> ssl:send(Socket, Data) end),
  860:             NewSize = Size - byte_size(Data),
  861:             ssl:setopts(Socket, [{active, once}]),
  862:             echo_active_once(Socket, NewSize)
  863:     end.
  864: 
  865: %% Receive Size bytes
  866: echo_active(_Socket, 0) ->
  867:     ok;
  868: echo_active(Socket, Size) ->
  869:     receive
  870:         {ssl, Socket, Data} ->
  871:             spawn(fun() -> ssl:send(Socket, Data) end),
  872:             echo_active(Socket, Size - byte_size(Data))
  873:     end.    
  874:         
  875:
